contentrichtext.text: {{Other people|Richard Stevenson}} {{primary sources|date=December 2010}} {{BLP sources|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} '''Richard Stevenson''' is a [[Canada|Canadian]] [[poet]], born in Victoria, [[British Columbia]] in 1952,<ref>http://www.library.utoronto.ca/canpoetry/stevenson/index.htm</ref> he now lives in [[Lethbridge]], [[Alberta]].
